transactionPage.marketValueReceivedInfo: The price of the received assets at the time of receiving

transactionPage.marketValueReceivedAssets: Market value of the received assets({{currency}})

taxReportPage.incomeFromTransfersInfo: Total gains from sale/trading of virtual digital assets
taxReportPage.businessIncomeInfo: Aggregate of incomes classified as Business/ Other Income, generally shall include interest, airdrops, mining income, etc.
taxReportPage.totalExpenseInfo: Aggregate expenses incurred during the period on all transactions undertaken
taxReportPage.netIncomeInfo: Aggregate income from gains on transfer and business/other income as reduced by expenses incurred
taxReportPage.fundsInfusedInfo: Aggregate value of money invested during the year
taxReportPage.fundsWithdrawnInfo: Aggregate amount of money withdrawn from all sources during the year
taxReportPage.reportBeingDownloaded: Your report is being downloaded. This might take a while.
taxReportPage.openingBalanceInfo: Fair Value of assets at the beginning of the financial year (1st April)
taxReportPage.closingBalanceInfo: Fair Value of assets at the end of the financial year (31st March)
